title: request for name change document

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I changed my name when I became a U.S. citizen in Honolulu in 2006.
I need the original certificate court order for my name change.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

MIKI HYUN

title: Becky Boyer FOIA Request

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Becky Boyer FOIA Request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

In response to my request regarding who requested Jeff and Amner Aguirre's records you stated that Becky Boyer did on 02/12/2024, can you please tell me when you responded to this request with the requested information?

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

title: San Jose Cease and Desist

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: San Jose Cease and Desist
communications.communication:
To Whom it may concern,
Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:
Records from the past year regarding your nuisance property ordinance that will be referred to as ordinance in this request but could be known (but not limited to) as Administrative Nuisance Abatement as described in Chapter 1.13 of the city code.

Please provide any and all nuisance abatement cease and desist orders (including but not limited to hard-copy documents, memos, emails, word processor documents, PDF documents, PowerPoint files, images files, video files etc.) from January 1, 2024 to the date this request is filed. This should include documents used to determine whether the property is considered a nuisance. 


The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request.
Sincerely,
Jenny Wadhwa

title: Community Care Guidebook

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Community Care Guidebook
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Chapter 1.8 of the VHA Office of Community Care Field Guidebook: Specialty Programs.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jasper Craven

title: Arrest of Bruce Guthrie (Snohomish County Sheriff's Office)

communications.subject: Washington Public Records Act Request: Arrest of Bruce Guthrie (Snohomish County Sheriff's Office)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any incident report, narrative, or similar report concerning the detention or arrest of Bruce Guthrie on June 14, 2024 at or near the the Frances Anderson Play Field.

2. Any body camera, vehicle camera, or similar recording depicting the detention, arrest, or transportation of Bruce Guthrie on June 14, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

communications.subject: County Public Records :: K137330-062624
communications.communication:
Dear Adam Steinbaugh: 
Your request has been received by our request portal system and has been assigned tracking number K137330-062624. Please use this number in any future communications concerning this request. 
We will be assessing your request to determine the following: 
 
  * If the request is seeking Court records to be processed under the Access to Administrative Records GR 31.1 (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.HUxyMBgfY4TlKlzKsACEZ9SJaHq8vPQxtKuPkGgEueRwxGbPc2YzDsXv-2BSkqqMWbRZVYSwHutNsHz6X0M2Z6cTLqCF4rlikJf0vhay5-2BLaJfnx-2FFIUtF3uWjre7yS5gRE1712tXzGbHcGpAaoNqysg-3D-3Dj1f9_SwdSys7yVCrZJosWmnmQhOJwgn5vwcQpru-2FOKj0PgrCVx1GPcL81WMzvh1-2BxCSBSMYhau79tbPVTXNABo61qluO6MTH3Q4QGr5zeJVxYsyOfymJSPhjyrpNoClc6ZcGXicuT8fwJB9YkxI6hecdJeopT3As4iBqfvk6lapPaCMS8xoUoVJf599rE2od3DiiAwVXAGfQapQr87oxtPa-2BpfJ-2FcmKWb-2BpY7Tdw4PafoRXgDJR-2BWGCVMkh6iOkvt-2FTfNSJHjdXI71auerXSE6tJjg0E1ecalfXCldvkIpPuTQ4VzIM2KgwBSuuiH6TR3FdZPHqjXhdyHo067SBjisLzRjpcPTNZ91Fc-2FD9pALNdXKHhfSVghYWD8FPcJHzB1DYcFg-2FKiQXlW2C7-2BZqQdNeoLrg-3D-3D) 
  * If the request is seeking records available under the Public Records Act chapter 42.56 RCW, or is seeking information held by the County. (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.aAfDQJdi7CXGjml-2FU1rlwi5TLnnbcqfrtvEO3Ej8PKwNKt3lGG-2FYLIVChKvlMe6DZWJMj1JBZeE5eNM-2F1lAIRA-3D-3DBFxP_SwdSys7yVCrZJosWmnmQhOJwgn5vwcQpru-2FOKj0PgrCVx1GPcL81WMzvh1-2BxCSBSMYhau79tbPVTXNABo61qluO6MTH3Q4QGr5zeJVxYsyOfymJSPhjyrpNoClc6ZcGXicuT8fwJB9YkxI6hecdJeopT3As4iBqfvk6lapPaCMS8xoUoVJf599rE2od3DiiAwVXAGfQapQr87oxtPa-2BpfJ-2FcmKWb-2BpY7Tdw4PafoRXgDJR-2BWGCVMkh6iOkvt-2FTfN9tyNiJlafwhAw18-2ByyK2Aq0lG-2BjPn-2F9CdPPnEvQCyng-2BQ391mo0RX2AeitKbbl0Ng9U4fZFMz407EOc3bGnTTUTyXCMSfS7Poj4xqiv3qknDl639zcLByfvaW6LQs1j1snVn2aBpk9qweygL7re0JA-3D-3D) 
  * If the request is seeking records held by another agency. 
  * Which Snohomish County department is best suited to be your point of contact. 
Please anticipate hearing from the assigned department within five business days. 
 Your Request Information 
Description of Request: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any incident report, narrative, or similar report concerning the detention or arrest of Bruce Guthrie on June 14, 2024 at or near the the Frances Anderson Play Field.

2. Any body camera, vehicle camera, or similar recording depicting the detention, arrest, or transportation of Bruce Guthrie on June 14, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

communications.subject: Welcome to the Records Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Adam Steinbaugh, 

Thank you for registering with the City of Edmonds, WA Public Records Center. 
Your Login ID is:  166206-39083884@requests.muckrock.com 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may Request a Temporary Password. (https://edmondswa.mycusthelp.com/WEBAPP/_rs/forgotpassword.aspx) 
Please login to " My Request Center" to update your account information, track the status of your request and receive requested records when they become available. (https://edmondswa.mycusthelp.com/WEBAPP/_rs/CustomerHome.aspx?sSessionID=[SESSIONS_ID]) 
Thank You, 
City of Edmonds, WA

title: Missouri camping ban correspondence

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Missouri camping ban correspondence
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All e-mail communications (including complete email chains, email attachments, calendar invitations, and calendar invitation attachments sent or received by Rep. Peggy McGaugh, Rep. Jamie Burger, Rep. Andrew McDaniel, or Rep. Bruce DeGroot that a) contains the terms "Cicero," "housing," "camping," "shelter," or "homeless" and b) was sent or received between 6/1/2021 and 8/1/2022.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Rebecca Burns

communications.subject: RE: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Missouri camping ban correspondence
communications.communication:
Ms. Burns, I am responding to your request for records dated June 25, 2024. The House of Representatives is not the custodian of records of individual representatives. The Missouri Constitution, Article III, Section 19, states that “Each member of the general assembly is the custodian of legislative records under the custody and control of the member, their employees and staff.”

The House does not retain the email reocords of former representatives McDaniel or DeGroot. For current representatives McGaugh and Burger, you may wish to contact the representative’s office directly for assistance; the contact information may be found here: https://house.mo.gov/MemberRoster.aspx

Thank you,

Bryan D. Scheiderer
General Counsel
Missouri House of Representatives
(573) 522-2639

title: Niagara County Clerk's Office employees (2022 - 2024)

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Niagara County Clerk's Office employees (2022 - 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

SENT VIA EMAIL TO peter.lopes@niagaracounty.com on 6/25/2024

***Please provide the records for each year as they become available***

1.) Yearly salary, name, and title of any and all Niagara County Clerk's Office employees for the following timeframe: 01/01/2022 through 12/31/2022

2.)  Yearly salary, name, and title of any and all Niagara County Clerk's Office employees for the following timeframe: 01/01/2023 through 12/31/2023

3.) Yearly salary, name, and title of any and all Niagara County Clerk's Office employees for the following timeframe: 01/01/2023 through 6/25/2024

https://www.niagaracounty.com/departments/a-f/county_clerk/index.php

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family

Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (St. Mary's County Sheriff)

communications.subject: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (St. Mary's County Sheriff)
RE: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (St. Mary's County Sheriff)
communications.communication:
Good afternoon Ms. Levi,

We received your Public Information Act request however the Fiscal Year 2024 has not yet closed.  Do you want the report run through the current date for 2024 or do you wish to wait until after the Fiscal Year for 2024 has ended?  Our Fiscal Year ends on June 30, 2024.

Thank you,


Karen M. Moore
St. Mary's County Sheriff's Office
Coordinator III
Office of Professional Responsibilities, Internal Affairs
Work: (301)475-4200 extension 1903
Karen.Moore@stmaryscountymd.gov<mailto:Karen.Moore@stmarysmd.com>
This electronic message transmission contains information that may be confidential or privileged.  The information is intended to be for the use of the individual or entity named above.  If you have received this communication in error, please re-send this communication to the sender and delete the original message and any copy of it from your computer system. Thank you.

Police Records Request :: P000400-062624
Welcome to the Records Request Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Deborah Levi, 
 
Thank you for registering with the Public Records Request Center. 
 
Your Login ID is:  166091-06307159@requests.muckrock.com 
 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
 
 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may request a temporary password here: Request Temporary Password (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXagLQZQtGNEtRQI39BAd0XHHJq98-2FZf9be-2Fy-2BIgLt8UHyGng0YeTBq1krcETHTaFpGf4Gmo-2F05H92DjNiu-2B-2FQUs-3D86lB_VLOS47hRz82BxY1N0fj-2BvrEIeoaa6Y0fxkGPDSmAo2ePUlKHpvyiY3Ku82YGCh-2Fh6BwWfDo-2FyPHua1J1pY1VCidJr2f45bbUKEqAU08xW85VNQRUlrewTz1-2FlWjnF1RKVxlqTHKKcM1NugqHNmU67NdlIvnjLOBOS1MpbHfOE7Hh6enZVMmEm3e-2FGr3F2UblO-2FzzFvDCDeIpVaCyAozl2-2FtHsUnzjs3vTDXh2e6CjT4-3D) 
 
Please login to My Records Center to update your account information, track the status of your request and receive requested records when they become available. (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXagLQZQtGNEtRQI39BAd0XHHJq98-2FZf9be-2Fy-2BIgLt8UHPbRVY9kbkfLRcFDR0XN49uzIZ9YI2F6Amct-2F6uP8LNg-3DIV0e_VLOS47hRz82BxY1N0fj-2BvrEIeoaa6Y0fxkGPDSmAo2ePUlKHpvyiY3Ku82YGCh-2Fh6BwWfDo-2FyPHua1J1pY1VCrEJWZXj95Tpi3aZQV5XFPQKp1TZn6FdqZbj2FfcIJHn3URtR3t2Diut-2FNxg5zw7cKvRMxgcLGNeEggKEN6fG1cavkcuK6APHZPkhX81OwvygAZFob02WxD8AD-2BeTBdSfCcaIR6b39iqGpIceWt7KwE-3D)

title: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (Kent County Sheriff's Office)

communications.subject: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (Kent County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication:
I have attached a file, which is an excel document.  It includes all the information you requested.  There are separate tabs at the bottom for the separate years information.  If you have any questions please contact me.
Capt. Harry Kettner
Kent County Sheriff's Office
410-778-2279
hkettner@kentgov.org

communications.subject: PIA request
communications.communication:
I am sending this email to advise that the Kent County Sheriff's Office received a PIA request and that request has been completed at no cost.  The information requested was entered on the provided website in the original email request.
Please contact me with any questions or concerns.
Regards,

Capt. H.A. Kettner #0038
Chief Deputy
Kent County Sheriff's Office
104 Vicker's Dr., Unit B
Chestertown, MD 21620
Phone  410-778-2279
Fax  410-778-7488
hkettner@kentgov.org<mailto:hkettner@kentgov.org>

[Text  Description automatically generated with medium confidence]


CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this electronic message is confidential information intended for the use of the individual or entity named above. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, or an employee or agent responsible for delivering this electronic message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this electronic message in error, please immediately notify us by telephone and return or destroy the original message to assure that it is not read, copied, or distributed by others.

communications.subject: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (Harford County Sheriff)
FW: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (Harford County Sheriff)
communications.communication:
Deborah Levi,

Please be advised that our agency now utilizes an online system, GovQuest, and we no longer accept PIA requests by email as stated on our website.  You can submit a request and make payment online by using GovQuest, by mail, or in person (along with payment) at our Headquarters, located at 45 S. Main St., Bel Air, MD, 21014.

Sincerely,


Michelle Hanks
Harford County Sheriff’s Office
Public Information Act Liaison
Office: 443-409-3403 (33403)
Email:  hanksm@harfordsheriff.org<mailto:hanksm@harfordsheriff.org>
Request Submission: https://app.govquest.com/
https://harfordsheriff.org/services/pia/

[A picture containing text, clipart  Description automatically generated]     [Qr code  Description automatically generated]

communications.communication:
Montgomery County Police Records 
 
Dear Amelia McDonell-Parry 
 
Thank you for registering with Montgomery County Police Department Records Center. 
 
Your Login ID is:  166083-97352315@requests.muckrock.com 
 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
 
Please login to the Records Center to update your account information, track the status of your request and receive requested records when they become available. communications.subject: Other Public Records Request :: R069754-062624
communications.communication:
Montgomery County Police Records 
 
Dear Amelia McDonell-Parry: 
Thank you for your interest in public records of Montgomery County Police Department. Your request has been received and is being processed in accordance with the Maryland’s Public Information Act (PIA). Your request was received in this office on 6/26/2024 and given the reference number R069754-062624 for tracking purposes. Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Maryland Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records for every sworn officer and civilian member of the Montgomery County Police Department for fiscal year 2023 and fiscal year 2024:

1. First and last name;
2. Unique sequence number;
3. Race;
4. Gender;
5. Hire date;
6. 2023 salary;
7. 2023 overtime;
8. 2024 salary;
9. 2024 overtime.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. Alternatively, please consider waiving any fees, pursuant to § 4-206(e)(2)(ii) of the General Provisions Article, as this request is on behalf of individuals served by the Maryland Office of the Public Defender, a state government agency, which solely serves indigent citizens of Maryland. As a result, my request for the above-listed public records is in the public interest. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Deborah Levi
Director of Special Litigation
Maryland Office of the Public Defender
(443) 272-1068

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fmontgomery-county-police-department-672%252Frequest-for-your-agencys-2023-2024-roster-salary-data-montgomery-county-police-department-166083%252F%253Femail%253DRecords.MCPD%252540montgomerycountymd.gov&url_auth_token=AAAc7Hvjgz2MOtMQgBByBdEGAxU%3A1sMdYq%3APnzg69TidEJeI10iLWd0IAWPzeiFDlYpL9s9cNrRjzE 
Your request will be forwarded to the relevant department(s) to locate the information you seek and to determine the volume and any costs associated with satisfying your request. You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records in question. PLEASE NOTE: Maryland’s Public Information Act (PIA) does not require a governmental body to create new information, to do legal research, or to answer questions. 
You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. Again, thank you for using the Public Records Center. 
Montgomery County Police Department 
To monitor the progress or update this request please log into the Public Records Center (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXcTVU6Vv26V721rDjQJoiO1VUhSUkxXY-2FKB7nmNLWzfPb7XjvvShIdEmL8q2VLDSQV4V93Bz3ow5xttJL-2B22Qy1VkpAGHEsV4PNNGwgXSpmqf85Q_dSnJpoDhkZIaiLuS6H8WvYG-2Fs6-2BjXP4X4-2B8ye6rO6ANGCL1QM2878I4FrOskN-2BoDnrgauolno7Yhh1NNWI5NeO2LbmG1Jv0Rsf-2FpAb00ckCkc0i7mRkUem19HSWhg6h3IajS7euekRZGx7gGSgtrLOmLJi6Gn-2BNXmeLO2I6yLLzLYYW8n71ZPJr8PkKk5Hq-2FDoFbvm4r3Mh3sp1s0NVemWKgQZybP3nzB4GeY8psofBrP5XdWpje00ljiIzwzw5QpM5qgXtwnwBhwMleMsk6kc5qSFA0Jbkjy29G4Km31vHfObjNNkTRBOWvva3AVuV7CWrbgq1RzEHq0xEffVgKvV-2FitCBMco3xTmn3jRM5-2FRoOmvOvzLUR-2F6lduWFY4PNrwaO5YIwTU8fgNiA1sHWP-2BQ-3D-3D) 

Track the issue status and respond at: https://records-montgomerycountymd.govqa.us/WEBAPP//_rs/RequestEdit.aspx?rid=69754 (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXcTVU6Vv26V721rDjQJoiO1VUhSUkxXY-2FKB7nmNLWzfPh-2BNhsXKRT6cNBBGth4Z95SEjg9cn-2BiGvl3B5CjnX62sQH28GzwZNGjisR69VxBrrKLg5_dSnJpoDhkZIaiLuS6H8WvYG-2Fs6-2BjXP4X4-2B8ye6rO6ANGCL1QM2878I4FrOskN-2BoDnrgauolno7Yhh1NNWI5NeO2LbmG1Jv0Rsf-2FpAb00ckCkc0i7mRkUem19HSWhg6h3IajS7euekRZGx7gGSgtrLOmLJi6Gn-2BNXmeLO2I6yLLzLYYW8n71ZPJr8PkKk5Hq-2FDoFbvm4r3Mh3sp1s0NVemWKgQZybP3nzB4GeY8psofBrP5XdWpje00ljiIzwzw5QggUO7RoNP3PX-2Bn-2BchCh2pb4QhbEPz0nhPl-2F7vQfuzi-2BTuX1v5OQn5Ne7dMUWy-2FgKDdQ9BcsZcOAJcWHnCzu3NQvk8Suv-2Bba3ICX82ZElXwIuOWGJG-2FXAB5qD3uL2gDr9Hbnv29f1Vx-2B-2F6VWRrbsr-2BQ-3D-3D)
